name: Siofra
description:
Tales of faeries, myths of old, adventures to suit the brave and bold. And deep in the forest a child sings...



A Ludum Dare 35 entry for the theme Shapeshift.

We wanted to test out how we could use 2D art in a 3D environment for the potential use in VR story telling. Sit back, slot in the cardboard, and meet little Síofra ...


Controls
Android: Look Around
PC: Move Mouse


Music/SFX credits
Jankoehl • Madamvicious • Reinsamba • Duckduckpony • Adelamtemos • Mentalsanityoff • Chesshunter • Stevious42
